pruned.midnightconfig.title: Pruned
pruned.midnightconfig.uploadStrategy.too: Upload on intervals, on server stops, or manually.
pruned.midnightconfig.stopUploadOnServer: Forcefully stop uploads when the server stops or the world is closed. Does nothing with SERVER_STOP strategy.
pruned.midnightconfig.autoAddInhabitedCh: Automatically add inhabited regions to the world download
pruned.midnightconfig.inhabitedTime.tool: The time (in minutes) a chunk has to be inhabited before the region is added to the world download.
pruned.midnightconfig.uploadFolder.toolt: The name of the folder the worlds are uploaded in.
pruned.midnightconfig.maxConcurrentUploa: Try lowering this when experiencing TPS issues.
